name: Backtesting
description: Welcome to my journey into quant. You can find some beautiful backtesting visualizations here.划重点:此处的beautiful hope不是只有颜色和线条，还有高Sharpe高Returns的beautiful performance.正在努力探索这样的策略:)

name: Photo Dumps
description: Photo dumps of my uni life.存一点pyq里没有的照片εïз

album.title: Twilight
album.describe:
No measure of time with you will be long enough, 
so let's start with forever.

album.title: The Vampire Diaries
album.describe:
In death comes peace. But pain is the cost of living. 
Like love, it's how we know we're alive.

album.title: A Beautiful Mind
album.describe:
Well, how big is the universe?
-Infinite.-How do you know?
Because all the data indicate it.
-It hasn't been proven?-No.
You haven't seen. How do you know for sure?
I don't, I just believe it.
It's the same with love, I guess.

album.title: Dune
album.describe:
The mystery of life isn't a problem to solve but a reality to experience.
A process that cannot be understood by stopping it.
We must move with the flow of the process.
We must join it.
We must flow with it.

album.title: Interstellar
album.describe:
Love is the one thing we're capable of perceiving
that transcends dimensions of time and space.

album.title: Inception
album.describe:
So do you want to take a leap of faith
or become an old man, filled with regret waiting to die alone?
